participant_abstract.sent: The meeting was a natural proggression from the previos meeting with all those doing research bringing new and relevant infromation to the table.
There was perhaps too much influence from the designers and not enough from marketing director.
However our conclusions and ideas to some extent have pre empted the findings from the research and our ideas have been ahead of the game.
This includes the idea of speech recognition, the shape and concept of the remote.
The influence of fruit on design could have been taken to literally with the predetermined company colours pointing us towards certain fruits and hence a certain product.
However, we have come up with and devised a complex but yet unique design.
It would be simple to use but perhaps costly to make.
However, our roles have become clearer and we have devised something which should be unique.

participant_actions.sent: Industrial designer and interface designer to decide upon a design and to model in clay.
The marketing director to evalaute product.
The project manager to over see and prepare for final meeting.

participant_decisions.sent: The energy source was decided upon.
The user interface was decided upon.

participant_problems.sent: Problems only arose from the discussion of the feasibility of design with certain materials.
These were discussed and resolved though in the meeting.
